remixlab.bias

Class GrabberObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • remixlab.bias.GrabberObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Grabber
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InteractiveGrabberObject

    public abstract class GrabberObject
extends Object
implements Grabber
    Grabber object which eases third-party implementation of the Grabber interface.

    Based on the concrete event type, this model object splits the checkIfGrabsInput(BogusEvent) and the performInteraction(BogusEvent) methods into more specific versions of them, e.g., checkIfGrabsInput(ClickEvent), checkIfGrabsInput(DOF3Event), performInteraction(DOF6Event) , performInteraction(KeyboardEvent) and so on. Thus allowing implementations of this abstract GrabberObject to override only those method signatures that might be of their interest.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GrabberObject()
      Empty constructor.
      GrabberObject(Agent agent)
      Constructs and adds this grabber to the agent pool.
      GrabberObject(InputHandler inputHandler)
      Constructs and adds this grabber to all agents belonging to the input handler.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkIfGrabsInput(BogusEvent event)
      Defines the rules to set the grabber as an agent input-grabber.
      boolean checkIfGrabsInput(MotionEvent event)
      Calls checkIfGrabsInput() on the proper motion event: DOF1Event, DOF2Event, DOF3Event or DOF6Event.
      boolean grabsInput(Agent agent)
      Check if this object is the Agent.inputGrabber() .
      boolean grabsInput(InputHandler inputHandler)
      Checks if the frame grabs input from any agent registered at the given input handler.
      void performInteraction(BogusEvent event)
      Defines how the grabber should react according to the given bogus-event.

      • grabsInput

        public boolean grabsInput(Agent agent)
        Check if this object is the Agent.inputGrabber() . Returns true if this object grabs the agent and false otherwise.

      • checkIfGrabsInput

        public boolean checkIfGrabsInput(MotionEvent event)
        Calls checkIfGrabsInput() on the proper motion event: DOF1Event, DOF2Event, DOF3Event or DOF6Event.

        Override this method when you want the object to be picked from a KeyboardEvent.
